argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dfdif2 | |- ( A \ A ) = { x e. A | -. x e. A } |
| 2 |  | #P_dfnul3 | |- (/) = { x e. A | -. x e. A } |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( A \ A ) = (/) |
\
 The difference between a class and itself is the empty set.  Proposition 5.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20.  Also Theorem 32 of [Suppes] p. 28. Alternate proof of ~ difid .  (Contributed by David Abernethy, 17-Jun-2012.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
